title: Adobe Photoshop Lightroom CC 2015 6 1 MacOSX
description:
INCLUDES: Adobe CC Activator 

From first look to final image, Adobe Photoshop Lightroom makes everything about digital photography easier, faster, and more amazing. Perfect your shots with powerful new adjustment tools like the Advanced Healing Brush. Efficiently organize all your photos and share them almost anywhere.

Requirements:
Multicore Intel processor with 64-bit support*
Mac OS X 10.8, 10.9, or 10.10
2 GB of RAM (8 GB recommended
1 GB of Video RAM (VRAM). 2 GB of dedicated VRAM is suggested for large, high resolution monitors, such as 4K and 5K-resolution monitors.
2 GB of available hard-disk space (cannot install on a volume that uses a case-sensitive file system or on removable flash storage devices).
